thread.section_title: Parcel Monkey USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Parcel Monkey USA | parcelmonkey.com
thread.title: White Falcon
thread.title_full: Parcel Monkey USA reviewed by White Falcon

author: White Falcon
title: White Falcon
text: Trying to send some clothing to my mom I was astonished by the outrageous prices fedex usps and UPS would charge: between 250$ and 60$. Parcel monkey did deliver the parcel in an excellent shape. The envelope looked like new according to my mom. And the price was a very reasonable 25$, between 1000% and 240% cheaper. I had some concern at some point not being able to track the parcel but after leaving a message I was contacted withing the same day with a tracking link. Would ship again. I am having serious doubts regarding some evaluations here. Seems like some big companies do not want to stop being able to abuse customers with outrageous pricing. To Quote: one of the reviews "they are cheap you get what you pay for". Well for starters 25$ isn't cheap I actually consider it the maximum amount acceptable for a small package les than 2lb and many countries won't dare charge you more for that. And 250$ to ship a package that is still less than 2lb, isn't normal pricing it's called theft.
